full_summary:
=====================================================

**Preventative Maintenance, Qualification and Calibration of Central Medical Equipment Depot (CMED) and Detachment Trenton Equipment RFP**
=====================================================

**Reference Number**: WS3976195208 / Doc3976307320
**Amendment Number**: 3

**Tender Notice Publication Date**: April 21, 2023
**Tender Closing Date**: May 09, 2023 14:00:00 (Eastern Daylight Time)

**Agency Information**

*   Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
*   11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec K1A 0S5, Canada

**Contact Information**

*   Darlene Keenan (SPAC/PSPC)
*   darlene.keenan@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

**Project Overview**

The Canadian Government is seeking tenders for the preventative maintenance, qualification, and calibration of refrigerators and freezers used to store pharmaceuticals at Central Medical Equipment Depot (CMED) and Detachment Trenton.

**UNSPSC Codes**

*   72151200: Heating and cooling and air conditioning HVAC construction and maintenance services
*   72151207: Heating and cooling and air conditioning HVAC installation and maintenance service

**Procurement Details**

*   Method of procurement: Competitive - Open bidding
*   Notice type: Request for Proposal
*   Selection criteria: Highest combined rating of technical merit and price
*   Trade agreements: Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, and Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
*   Regions of opportunity: Ontario (except National Capital Region) and Petawawa

**Tender Requirements**

*   Offers must be submitted electronically through CanadaBuys and Ariba Discovery by May 09, 2023, at 14:00 EDT.
*   Late bids will be declared non-responsive.

The contract duration is expected to be approximately 5 years, between May 15, 2023, and April 30, 2028.

**Access to Tender Documents**

Please visit the Ariba Discovery website at [http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16067841?extsite=MTYwNjc4NDFfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MD
